thread.section_title: Vodafone Ireland Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Vodafone Ireland | www.vodafone.ie
thread.title: Patricia Ogorman
thread.title_full: Vodafone Ireland reviewed by Patricia Ogorman

author: Patricia Ogorman
title: Patricia Ogorman
text: to everyone concerned please do not go to the vodafone shop on o connell st ennis co clare you will be met by a very rude man who has no notion of helping anyone my mobile broadband didnt work and he literally flung the sim on the counter and walked away he is an aggressive character who takes his personal issues out on the general public very sad to be honest but it takes all types....now i have to go back and use my old sim card and the upgrade i should have received has,nt worked but vodafone are still charging me each month for it
